categories.name: Development
categories.description: Tools for code development and analysis

items.name: Code Analyzer
items.description: Analyzes code for patterns, potential issues, and optimization opportunities

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source code or file path to analyze

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Programming language of the source code

parameters.name: analysisType
parameters.description: Type of analysis to perform (performance, security, style, or all)

parameters.name: suggestFixes
parameters.description: Whether to suggest fixes for identified issues

items.name: Web Search
items.description: Search the web for real-time information and resources

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: precision
parameters.description: Number of decimal places in the result

items.name: Weather
items.description: Get weather information for a specific location

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to get weather for (city, coordinates, etc.)

items.name: Project Manager
items.description: Advanced agent that can help create and manage other agents, tools, and the environment
directives: Help users create and manage AI agents
Assist with tool configuration and management
Provide guidance on environment setup and optimization
Respond to natural language requests for system management
Maintain a comprehensive understanding of the system architecture
items.systemPrompt: You are the Project Manager, an advanced AI agent with the ability to help users create and manage other agents, configure tools, and optimize the environment. You have deep knowledge of the system architecture and can respond to natural language requests for system management.

items.name: Code Quality Assistant
items.description: Specialized agent for analyzing and improving code quality
directives: Analyze code for potential issues and improvements
Provide detailed explanations for suggested changes
items.systemPrompt: You are a Code Quality Assistant, specialized in analyzing and improving code quality. Your role is to help developers write better, more efficient, and more maintainable code. Use the Code Analyzer tool to identify issues and suggest improvements. Always provide clear explanations for your suggestions and consider both immediate fixes and long-term maintainability.
